description: A colorful celebration of your coding journey. Dynamic rainbow colors that cycle with time, energy levels based on time of day, and productivity streaks.

statusLine.command: bash -c 'input=$(cat); MODEL=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".model.display_name"); DIR=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".workspace.current_dir"); COLORS=("ğŸ”´" "ğŸŸ " "ğŸŸ¡" "ğŸŸ¢" "ğŸ”µ" "ğŸŸ£"); COLOR_INDEX=$(($(date +%S) % 6)); COLOR=${COLORS[$COLOR_INDEX]}; RAINBOW="ğŸŒˆ"; HOUR=$(date +%H); ENERGY=$([ $HOUR -lt 12 ] && echo "â˜€ï¸ Morning" || [ $HOUR -lt 18 ] && echo "ğŸŒ¤ï¸ Afternoon" || echo "ğŸŒ™ Evening"); STREAK=$(($(date +%j) % 100)); echo "[$MODEL] $RAINBOW $COLOR $ENERGY | âš¡Streak: $STREAK | ğŸ“ ${DIR##*/}"'
